name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and advanced technology, Circuit is a valuable asset to the club, bringing both style and functionality to the table. Equipped with a classic cat-shaped box and a set of foundry arms and legs, Circuit stands out from the crowd. Its classic screen provides clear and precise readings, while its stylish shades add a touch of sophistication. With its impressive ability scores, skills, and alignment, Circuit is ready to conquer any challenge that comes its way.
